title: Rocket Stove Mass Heater
subtitle: Double Bells (Designed by Martin Karl Waldenburg, Germany)
about:
A [rocket stove][1] mass heater is an innovative and efficient space
heating system. Multiple small bells are effective in heat extraction
than a single big bell, the total volume can be smaller too. They can be
arranged in many ways, at the side or on top of another. The top
arrangement is used to place a baking oven in one of them. The following
simulation is a double-bell model designed by Martin Karl Waldenburg
from Germany.



[1]: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rocket_stove
